CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm up to MOT then leaves room
MOT places CHI on the floor
CHI walks out of camera range
<bef> MOT turns to place her bag on the chair by the door
CHI bends down picking up something off the floor . CHI balances object on chair
CHI looks at object in his hands . <aft> CHI looks to his side in the direction of camera
MOT moves over to CHI then reaches for object
MOT removes object from CHI hand placing it on the floor
MOT bends down as she reaches for toys on the floor beside them
CHI turns around and looks at toys
<bef> MOT reaches for toy . MOT holds toy up in front of CHI
CHI turns and looks in the direction of the table beside him . CHI walks toward the table
<aft> CHI throws football on the table
football rolls past MOT on the floor
CHI looks up then walks toward the desk
<aft> CHI pulls out the gate that is attached to the side of the desk
<bef> MOT gets up and sits in the chair beside the desk
CHI looks in the direction MOT points
CHI walks past MOT then reaches for the wastebasket and looks down into it
MOT remains seated in the chair while holding the football in one hand
CHI turns around facing the center of the room . CHI walks into the center of the room while looking down at the floor . <aft> CHI turns and looks up at MOT
MOT holds football out toward CHI
CHI looks beyond MOT and walks toward the desk
MOT leans out of the chair reaching for another toy
CHI turns away from the desk and looks toward MOT
<aft> CHI rocks from side to side on his feet
CHI bends down and picks up the car
<bef> CHI drops the car while walking across the room . <aft> CHI grabs the gate attached to the desk and pulls it out
MOT looks at CHI while moving toward the desk in a squatting position
CHI looks at MOT then across the room
CHI pulls on the gate with one hand
<aft> MOT looks at CHI while holding the football up in the air
CHI looks in the direction of the football
<aft> CHI pulls the gate out further
MOT holds ball out toward CHI
MOT rolls ball past CHI on the floor
CHI looks down watching the ball roll
ball is out of view of the camera
CHI turns around then walks toward the gate
CHI grabs the gate and pulls on it
MOT puts her hand on the gate so CHI cannot open it
CHI looks down then points down
CHI walks closer to the table then looks up into the camera placing his hand on top of the table
MOT is behind CHI kneeling down on one knee and visible from the waist down
CHI stares into the camera briefly then turns around and walks into the middle of the room
CHI bends down and touches something
MOT reaches down and points at the tape . <aft> MOT reaches for another toy
CHI looks straight ahead with his back to the camera
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and places it in her lap
CHI bends down and plays with the tape on the floor
MOT moves closer to CHI . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks up then stands taking a few steps toward MOT while reaching for jack+in+the+box
CHI touches jack+in+the+box then tries to open lid
<aft> CHI turns and walks toward wastebasket
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI bends down and touches the door stop next to the wastebasket
MOT stops turning the handle then moves herself up into the chair
CHI turns around and walks toward MOT . CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
MOT turns handle and jack+in+the+box pops up
<bef> CHI pushes back the jack+in+the+box lid
CHI shakes the hand of the clown
MOT holds jack+in+the+box in her lap then touches the clowns head
CHI looks down at the floor briefly then back up at the jack+in+the+box
CHI shakes the clowns hand with renewed vigor then tries to stuff it into its box
CHI stuffs the clown into the box then takes a step back
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box while keeping one hand on the box
MOT looks down while holding the jack+in+the+box in her lap
CHI attempts to turn the crank then lets go of it
<aft> CHI looks over by the door then turns and looks down at the tape on the floor
CHI bends down and touches the tape then picks up a toy
<bef> MOT has stopped turning the crank
CHI turns around and looks in the direction of MOT while holding a duck in his hands . <aft> CHI walks toward MOT
MOT watches CHI while sliding the jack+in+the+box down her lap a little closer to CHI
CHI touches the jack+in+the+box with the duck
<aft> CHI steps back while looking down at the duck in his hands
CHI places the duck on top of the jack+in+the+box
the duck falls to the floor
<bef> MOT tries to balance duck on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI bends down and picks up the duck then stands up straight
MOT bends over placing the jack+in+the+box on the floor between her legs . <aft> MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box and leans back in the chair
CHI turns around in a circle while looking down at the floor
CHI bends down and tries to peel the tape off the floor . <aft> CHI taps the tape with the duck
<aft> CHI stands up and looks at MOT while walking toward her
CHI touches the jack+in+the+box with one hand while holding the duck in the other
the clown pops out as CHI holds on to the lid
MOT smiles and looks at the clown
<aft> MOT leans over and places the jack+in+the+box on the table . MOT holds the jack+in+the+box steady for CHI
CHI looks at and reaches for the clown . CHI walks toward the table with arm extended as MOT moves the jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box over the table
CHI begins to stuff the clown into its box
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box down so it is held in the air between MOT and CHI
MOT stuffs clown into its box
CHI closes the lid then opens it
<bef> CHI looks at the clown . CHI looks up at MOT then at the clown again
MOT looks at CHI and nods her head
MOT continues to hold the jack+in+the+box in the air between them
CHI moves duck close to the clown
CHI looks at the clown while touching its head
<bef> CHI drops the duck to the floor
CHI points to something on clowns head
CHI continues to look at and point to the clown eye
CHI pokes and picks at the clowns face
MOT holds jack+in+the+box as CHI touches clown
CHI continues to pick at clowns face
CHI turns away from the jack+in+the+box and looks briefly across the room
<aft> CHI bends down to touch the tape on the floor
CHI looks across the room then walks over to the book on the floor
CHI turns around and walks toward MOT
CHI gives the book to MOT
MOT is seated in the chair next to the door and visible from the neck down
MOT opens the book and begins to turn the pages
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box then up at MOT
CHI pushes the clown down in its box then lets go placing his hand on MOT's knee
CHI looks at book then turns and looks down at the floor
<aft> CHI bends down and pushes the clown down into its box then picks the jack+in+the+box by the clowns head
CHI holds the jack+in+the+box up in front of himself and looks at it . <aft> CHI turns toward MOT and holds the jack+in+the+box up in her direction
MOT grabs hold of the jack+in+the+box and squats down next to CHI . <aft> MOT snaps the lid shut
CHI pushes the jack+in+the+box into its box then closes the lid
<bef> MOT places the jack+in+the+box on the table
CHI watches MOT then reaches over to the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns around and looks at the door in response to noise outside the room . <aft> INV enters the room
INV explains Small Scale Activity then leaves the room
INV re-enters the room and explains Forbidden Object to MOT
INV places object on the table in front of CHI
CHI looks at object then reaches for it as INV places it on the table
MOT reaches for CHI's arm and moves it away from object . MOT looks at CHI
CHI sits back and stares at object
CHI stares at object with his hands on his lap under the table
CHI looks over at MOT briefly and reaches up to touch her . <aft> CHI looks at object
MOT looks at CHI while touching his hand
CHI looks at object then down at the table . <aft> CHI looks up at INV
INV holds on to the base of the object but is otherwise out of camera view
CHI pulls MOT hand to his face then puts MOT thumb in his mouth briefly
INV removes object and places it in the drawer
INV explains PCI boxes to MOT then leaves the room . <aft> INV comes back in with PCI boxes placing them on the desk then leaves the room again
MOT stands up and walks across the room to the desk
MOT is visible from the waist down
CHI stands in the middle of the room and points in the direction of the boxes . <aft> CHI walks toward boxes with arms outstretched
MOT places box on the floor
MOT squats down holding the box on the floor
CHI turns and follows MOT across the room . <aft> CHI squats down and reaches into the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box
MOT picks up the box the ball was in and places it on the chair
CHI turns and walks away from MOT with the ball
<aft> CHI tosses ball against the chair by the desk and it falls to the floor
MOT looks at CHI while extending both arms toward CHI
CHI turns and looks up while reaching for a box on top of the desk
MOT gets up on one knee and reaches over CHI head
MOT pushes boxes back a bit on top of the desk
CHI steps back looking up toward the boxes . CHI points up toward the boxes
MOT tosses ball up and down to herself
CHI turns and walks toward MOT . <aft> CHI looks down
CHI walks about in a circle looking down at the floor
CHI turns his back on MOT while holding the ball up over his head
MOT looks at CHI with her arms outstretched
CHI throws the ball under the table
<aft> CHI looks down and then around on the table
MOT watches CHI with outstretched arms
CHI walks around the table to the other side
<$=1> MOT reaches for the ball out of view of the camera
CHI looks down at something while standing behind the table
MOT is out of camera range
CHI looks down at something behind the table
CHI sits on a small stool
MOT reaches behind the table and picks up CHI then places him on the floor in front of the table
MOT bounces the ball on the floor a couple of times
CHI walks toward the chair and reaches for the box that the ball was in
MOT holds the ball up toward CHI
MOT is visible from the shoulders down
CHI lifts one flap of the box
<aft> CHI turns and looks at MOT then reaches for the ball
CHI takes the ball from MOT then stuffs it into the box
MOT takes the ball out of the box
CHI turns away from MOT and looks across the room then turns around and looks at the box again
MOT tosses the ball into the box
CHI walks over to the box and peers down into it
<aft> CHI picks up the box and walks across the room with it
<bef> MOT watches CHI . MOT stands up then reaches for CHI
MOT picks up the ball box and puts it on top of the desk
CHI looks down at something behind the table
MOT walks to the middle of the room carrying another box
MOT squats down in the middle of the room but is almost completely out of camera range
CHI squats down behind the table looking at something underneath it
MOT grabs CHI arm and begins to pull him to the center of the room
CHI struggles as MOT pulls his arm
MOT lets go of CHI then starts to open a new box
MOT takes towel out of box
MOT puts towel over her head
<aft> CHI bends down and touches the box the towel was in
MOT kneels on the floor with the towel over her head
CHI stands up and looks at MOT
CHI walks over to MOT and peeks under the towel then turns and begins to reach down for the box again
MOT pulls the towel off her face
CHI looks at MOT briefly then looks down at the box on the floor in front of him
<aft> CHI pushes the box lid a bit
<bef> MOT drapes the towel over her face again
MOT closes the box with the towel draped over her head
CHI looks down then turns his back on MOT and walks toward the table
MOT takes the towel off of her head
CHI puts his hands to his head then turns to face MOT
MOT drapes towel over CHI head
CHI walks around with the towel over his head
CHI walks out of camera range with the towel over his head
MOT gets up off her knees and reaches over for CHI
<aft> MOT pulls CHI back into the center of the room
MOT holds onto CHI by the waist
CHI pulls the towel off of his head
CHI walks away from MOT toward the table
MOT beckons CHI while out of camera range
MOT reaches behind table for CHI
CHI bends down to reach for something
MOT grabs hold of CHI's arm
MOT pulls CHI out from behind table
MOT lets go of CHI's arm
MOT puts the towel up in front of her face
CHI walks toward MOT and reaches for the towel
CHI reaches for the towel again burying his head in MOT's chest
MOT pulls the towel up over her face
CHI steps back a bit then looks at MOT . <aft> CHI buries his head in MOT's chest
MOT pulls the towel down and looks at CHI
MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
CHI pulls the towel off of his head
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI walks away from MOT while looking down
CHI walks out of camera range behind the table
MOT holds the towel in front of her face
CHI grabs hold of something over by the desk
MOT reaches behind CHI to replace object CHI has pulled out
MOT picks up CHI and carries him to the middle of the room
MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
CHI holds the towel in place covering his face
MOT kneels in front of CHI looking at him
MOT moves back a bit while looking at CHI
CHI turns sideways and looks across the room
CHI looks up while pointing at something on the wall out of view
<bef> MOT picks up the towel off the floor
CHI walks past MOT over to the door
MOT shifts her position so she is facing CHI
MOT puts the towel over her head
CHI reaches for something that hangs on the door while looking over his shoulder at MOT
MOT peeks out from underneath the towel at CHI
CHI turns toward the door and reaches up for something
MOT looks at CHI from underneath the towel
<aft> CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI grabs hold of the chair beside the door
CHI looks at MOT then across the room toward the camera
<aft> CHI starts to rock the chair
MOT looks at CHI while pulling the towel off of her head
MOT holds the towel out toward CHI . MOT looks at CHI
CHI walks toward MOT . CHI walks into the towel
MOT leans back away from CHI
CHI pulls the towel off of his head
MOT picks up the discarded towel
CHI walks around in front of MOT while looking down at something
<aft> MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
CHI walks across the room with the towel draped over his head
CHI pulls the towel off his head
CHI points up at something then reaches for the table . <aft> CHI looks down
MOT reaches down for the box on the floor next to CHI
<bef> CHI turns and takes a few steps toward the box
MOT holds the towel out toward CHI
CHI takes the towel and stuffs it into the box
MOT puts the cover on the box
CHI puts one knee on the box and pushes down with both hands then stands up
MOT picks up the box and places it on the desk across the room
CHI watches MOT while taking a few steps toward the desk
MOT places a new box on the floor
CHI turns toward MOT and box . <aft> CHI bends down reaching for the box
<bef> MOT opens the box and places the cover on the chair beside her
CHI falls forward into the box with both hands
CHI kneels down and leans over the box
<aft> MOT holds the crayon out toward CHI
<aft> CHI sits back then reaches forward into the box
CHI looks down then across the room toward the desk
MOT holds the crayon out toward CHI
CHI looks down then reaches into the box briefly
CHI puts his hand up to his mouth
MOT pulls CHI's hand out of his mouth
MOT picks up a crayon and holds it up in front of CHI
MOT drops the crayon into the box then takes something out of CHI's mouth
CHI sits across from MOT with his back to the camera . CHI is visible from the shoulders up through most of this sequence
MOT picks up the crayon and holds it up
MOT pulls some paper out of the box then starts to put it back into the box
CHI pulls some paper out of the box . <aft> CHI throws the paper on the floor in front of him
<aft> CHI looks up briefly then down again
<bef> CHI looks down . <aft> CHI reaches for the paper MOT draws on
MOT holds the crayon up in front of CHI
<bef> CHI picks up the paper MOT was drawing on then drops the paper to the floor
<aft> CHI shakes the paper in the air and taps it with the crayon . CHI shakes his head from side to side
<aft> MOT moves a piece of paper in front of CHI
CHI looks up and points to something off to the side
CHI leans forward and starts to color
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT looks up at CHI briefly
CHI leans forward then sits back while holding onto a crayon
MOT moves the paper a bit
<aft> MOT sits back and looks down
CHI touches one of his ears
MOT holds the paper in place with one finger
CHI leans forward and taps the crayon on the paper
CHI moves around a little on the floor
CHI leans forward then starts to color
CHI turns and looks into the box beside him . <aft> CHI reaches into the box
<aft> CHI removes some paper from the box and puts it on the floor in front of him
<bef> MOT sits back . MOT watches CHI
<aft> MOT picks up a piece of paper and places on top of CHI's pile
CHI's head is visible but the rest of his body is blocked from view by the table for the remainder of this activity
<aft> CHI puts a crayon in his mouth
<bef> MOT leans forward and shakes her head no
MOT refers to CHI putting a crayon in his mouth
<bef> MOT takes a piece of paper out of the box and puts it on the floor . MOT picks up a crayon
CHI looks in the direction of where MOT colors
CHI looks down at something in his hands
CHI seems to be coloring but his back blocks the activity from view
MOT holds the paper in place
CHI reaches over for something in the box next to him
CHI gets up on one knee and picks up a crayon in the box . <aft> CHI sits back down
CHI holds some crayons in his hand
MOT points to the paper in the box
CHI leans forward into the box with the crayons in his hands
CHI blocks the activity with his back
CHI fidgets with the crayon in his hands
CHI puts a crayon to his ear
CHI continues to hold the crayon up to his ear while shaking his head no
MOT points to the drawing with the crayon
MOT points to the paper while looking at CHI
CHI reaches into the box then looks off to one side
MOT looks down while pointing at something on the paper
MOT pulls her hand back into her lap
CHI reaches into the box briefly then sits back
MOT holds the paper in place
CHI hits the paper in the box with a crayon
MOT points while looking at CHI
CHI looks down and nods his head
CHI reaches for something on the floor beside him
CHI reaches forward toward the paper on the floor
MOT holds a crayon out to CHI
CHI takes the crayon from MOT
<aft> CHI reaches into the box with his other hand
MOT leans back away from CHI while looking down
<aft> CHI sits back then looks up at MOT
CHI looks in the direction of MOT then off to one side
CHI leans forward briefly then leans back and looks down at one hand
<aft> CHI puts a crayon in his mouth
<$=1> MOT begins to gather the papers and put them in the box
MOT reaches over and pulls the crayon out of CHI's mouth
MOT drops a pile of paper into the box

end of PCI- Crayons and Paper
MOT puts the crayons and paper box away
CHI points in the direction of the box
MOT places a new box on the floor in front of CHI
CHI sits back looking in the direction of MOT
MOT sits back and repositions herself so she sits facing CHI
MOT extends her arms toward CHI
<aft> MOT moves the box out of the way
CHI looks off to one side then points at something
MOT reaches over and picks up CHI . MOT places CHI on her lap
MOT holds the book in front of CHI and reads looking over his shoulder
CHI looks down at the book
<bef> MOT moves the book back and forth . <aft> MOT opens the book
CHI looks over at the door then down at the book
CHI looks at door in response to noise in the corridor
MOT points at picture then looks at CHI
<$=1> MOT points at the other page
CHI looks at and points to the door
MOT points then glances at CHI
MOT points from one picture to the next
MOT points then looks over at CHI
<$=1> MOT points as she looks at CHI
MOT points while looking at CHI
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI while pointing
MOT points then looks at CHI
MOT points then looks at CHI
CHI glances up and points to something briefly then looks down again
CHI closes the book then immediately opens it up again
MOT closes the book so the cover faces CHI
<$=1> MOT moves the book back and forth . <aft> MOT glances at CHI
MOT points then looks at CHI
CHI looks down and nods his head yes
CHI looks down while moving around a bit in MOT's lap
MOT glances at CHI while pointing
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks at book then begins to squirm in MOT's lap
MOT looks down while nodding her head in agreement
CHI gets up out of MOT's lap . <aft> CHI takes the book from MOT as he stands up
MOT looks off to her side where the book box is located
CHI drops the book into the box
MOT puts the cover on the box
MOT stands up with the book box and returns it to the desk
CHI looks over by the desk while pointing up at something
<$=1> MOT is visible from the waist down while at the desk getting a different box
CHI looks up toward desk and MOT
<aft> MOT puts the box on the chair across the room
CHI turns and walks over to where MOT has placed the box
MOT gets down on her knees beside the chair and looks over at the box
CHI looks into the box and reaches in with one hand
<aft> MOT takes the ball out of the box
CHI turns his body so he is facing MOT
MOT holds the ball while looking at CHI
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI kicks the ball while walking forward . <aft> CHI bends down to touch the tape on the floor
CHI stands up in front of MOT then reaches for the ball
MOT taps CHI's stomach with the ball
CHI grabs at the ball and misses
MOT bounces the ball off CHI then catches it
CHI turns toward MOT and reaches for the ball
MOT bounces the ball off CHI then catches it
CHI faces MOT completely now while reaching for the ball
MOT bounces the ball on CHI's head
